   "#"   	= {"#" =[
 3e3  ,	#
 ]}["##"."."]  # what?

str1 = "The quick brown fox
jumps over the lazy dog."

str2 = """
The quick brown \


  fox jumps over \
    the lazy dog."""

key3 = """\
       The quick brown \
       fox jumps over \
       the lazy dog.\
       """
-----------------------------------------------------------%
points = [ { "x" = 1, y = '2', 'z' = 3 },   [
           { "x" = 7, y = '8', 'z' = 9 },
           { "x" = 2, y = '4', 'z' = 8 }, ] ]
-----------------------------------------------------------%
[[fruit]]
  name = "apple"

  [fruit.physical]
    color = "red"
    shape = "round"

  [[fruit.variety]]
    name = "red delicious"

  [fruit.variety]
    name = "granny smith"

[[fruit]]
  name = "banana"

  [[fruit.variety]]
    name = "plantain"
-----------------------------------------------------------%
[x]
y=1
k={y : 2, k : 3}
-----------------------------------------------------------%
[a.fruit.shop.open.allday]
[[a.fruit]]
  [[a.fruit.shop]]
[[b.fruit.shop]]
  [[a.fruit.shop.open]]
  a=4
  [[a.fruit.shop.open]]
  a = 4
-----------------------------------------------------------%
[[e]]
[[e]]
f={}
[e.f.g]
-----------------------------------------------------------%
k = []
[[k]]
-----------------------------------------------------------%
table = {}
[table]
name = "gold"
-----------------------------------------------------------%
a = { c = { e = {} } }
[a.c.e]
